TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's mounted to your Chevy Impala.

I wish for everyone to have musical talent.

Granted. It's filled with bulldog ants. (look them up, they are terrifying)

I wish that I could be the first person to land on Mars

Granted. Oh wait, where's your space suit?

I wish that WW2 never happened.

Granted. However, the US never gets pulled out of the great depression, leaving it a 3rd world country, causing the world's economy to suffer, which slowly kills humanity until Interstellar happens

I wish for Interstellar to happen

Granted. It fails.

I wish people would stop obsessing over mindless sci-fi movies.

Granted, you now can hear SSTV transmissions.

I wish i had a RATO.

Granted, it is filled with deathstalker scorpions (again, look it up)

I wish every one on earth loved Interstellar, as it is NOT a mindless Sifi movie, and is a masterpiece that deserves all the awards

Granted. Due to over-obsession, the rest of the galaxy declares war on Earth. Oops.

I wish people would stop obsessing over Interstellar.

Granted. They obsess over Star Wars Episode VII instead, declaring it to be the best ever despite it actually being worse than Ep 1.

I wish Star Wars Episode VII actually does end up good.

granted. everyone starts obsessing over 2001: a space odessy and become super scared about computers

i wish you stepped on a mine turtle.

EDIT: DAMMIT YOU NINJA!!

Edited November 25, 2014 by teepee2345
ninjas

Granted. The idea police destroy Star Wars Episode VII and replace it with Your First Mind Control Victim, season 17.

CHAIN ninja? not good

I wish that everybody knew and played a set of 7 video games.

Granted. Instead of stepping, I say, "No, mine turtle, I am NOT stepping on you!"

Then, the llama in a car crashes into the next poster... Oh wait, wrong game.

I wish I hadn't gotten this thread confused with Survive that Attack.

Granted. You get chain ninja'd.

I wish my hair was larger.

Granted. Oh wait, that makes you go into a repeat of Tangled.

I wish the rest of the solar system was added in 0.17.

Granted, and it lags.

I wish that there was no more lag.

Granted, but it only works on my computer:P

I wish for a small cardboard box.

Granted. It somehow becomes sapient and empties itself to communicate.

I wish for a cardboard box to rule them all.

Granted. The cardboard turns out to be half antimatter. Boom.

I wish I lived in the UK.

Granted. You are dropped off on a star trek planet in feudal society. The nation you now live in is called the UK.

I wish for a bowl.

Granted. It's a bowl with a hole and it's stolen by a mole to give to a vole who's friends with a foal who'll grow up hauling coal for the ol' factory where they made the bowl.

I wish I was a better poet.

Granted. All of your fame and money gets taken away by the Poetry Fairy.

I wish I was the Poetry Fairy.

Granted, but you're actually the Vogon Poetry Fairy. You have to listen to every poem and know every uncomfortable meaning.

I wish for Double Duna.

Granted, but YOU never get to see it.

I wish this was my thousandth post.

Granted. You're given a new first post filled with your most embarassing memories.

I wish to write code more quickly.

Granted. You write code twice as fast as before. However, you take ten times longer to debug it.

I wish I had a new dressing gown, more comfortable than my current one.
